00045     const char *Protocol::ms_command_strings[COMMAND_MAX] = {
00046       "open",
00047       "create",
00048       "close",
00049       "read",

00070     CommBuf *
00071     Protocol::create_open_request(const String &fname, uint32_t bufsz) {
00072       CommHeader header(COMMAND_OPEN);
00073       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 4 + encoded_length_str16(fname));
00074       cbuf->append_i32(bufsz);
00075       cbuf->append_str16(fname);
00076       return cbuf;
00077     }
00078 
00079 
00082     CommBuf *
00083     Protocol::create_create_request(const String &fname, bool overwrite,
00084         int32_t bufsz, int32_t replication, int64_t blksz) {
00085       CommHeader header(COMMAND_CREATE);
00086       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 18 + encoded_length_str16(fname));
00087       cbuf->append_i16((overwrite) ? 1 : 0);
00088       cbuf->append_i32(replication);
00089       cbuf->append_i32(bufsz);
00090       cbuf->append_i64(blksz);
00091       cbuf->append_str16(fname);
00092       return cbuf;
00093     }
00094 
00095 
00098     CommBuf *Protocol::create_close_request(int32_t fd) {
00099       CommHeader header(COMMAND_CLOSE);
00100       header.gid = fd;
00101       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 4);
00102       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00103       return cbuf;
00104     }

00108     CommBuf *Protocol::create_read_request(int32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00109       CommHeader header(COMMAND_READ);
00110       header.gid = fd;
00111       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 8);
00112       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00113       cbuf->append_i32(amount);
00114       return cbuf;
00115     }
00116 
00117 
00118     CommBuf *Protocol::create_append_request(int32_t fd, StaticBuffer &buffer,
00119                                              bool flush) {
00120       CommHeader header(COMMAND_APPEND);
00121       header.gid = fd;
00122       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 9, buffer);
00123       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00124       cbuf->append_i32(buffer.size);
00125       cbuf->append_bool(flush);
00126       return cbuf;
00127     }

00130     CommBuf *Protocol::create_seek_request(int32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00131       CommHeader header(COMMAND_SEEK);
00132       header.gid = fd;
00133       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 12);
00134       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00135       cbuf->append_i64(offset);
00136       return cbuf;
00137     }

00141     CommBuf *Protocol::create_remove_request(const String &fname) {
00142       CommHeader header(COMMAND_REMOVE);
00143       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_str16(fname));
00144       cbuf->append_str16(fname);
00145       return cbuf;

00161     CommBuf *
00162     Protocol::create_position_read_request(int32_t fd, uint64_t offset,
00163                                            uint32_t amount) {
00164       CommHeader header(COMMAND_PREAD);
00165       header.gid = fd;
00166       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 16);
00167       cbuf->append_i32(fd);
00168       cbuf->append_i64(offset);
00169       cbuf->append_i32(amount);
00170       return cbuf;
00171     }

00225       CommHeader header(COMMAND_STATUS);
00226       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header);

00241     CommBuf *
00242     Protocol::create_rename_request(const String &src, const String &dst) {
00243       CommHeader header(COMMAND_RENAME);
00244       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_str16(src) +
00245                                   encoded_length_str16(dst));
00246       cbuf->append_str16(src);
00247       cbuf->append_str16(dst);
00248       return cbuf;
00249     }

00251     CommBuf *
00252     Protocol::create_debug_request(int32_t command,
00253                                    StaticBuffer &serialized_parameters) {
00254       CommHeader header(COMMAND_DEBUG);
00255       CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(header, 4, serialized_parameters);
00256       cbuf->append_i32(command);
00257       return cbuf;
00258     }
00259 
00260     const char *Protocol::command_text(uint64_t command) {
00261       if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00262         return "UNKNOWN";
00263       return ms_command_strings[command];
00264     }
